Changelog

If you are upgrading: please see UPGRADING.md.

9.0.2 - 2020-06-26

Changed

  • Upgrade hallmark devDependency from ^0.1.0 to ^2.0.0 (#53, #56) (@vweevers)
  • Upgrade standard devDependency from ^12.0.0 to ^14.0.0 (#52, #55) (@vweevers)
  • Upgrade nyc devDependency from ^13.2.0 to ^14.0.0 (#50) (@vweevers)

Fixed

  • Add buffer dependency for browsers (#58) (@hugomrdias)

9.0.1 - 2019-04-01

Changed

  • Upgrade standard devDependency from ^11.0.1 to ^12.0.0 (#38) (@ralphtheninja)
  • Update description in README and package.json (#47) (@vweevers)
  • Apply common project tweaks (#39, #40, #41) (@vweevers)
  • Tweak copyright year for less maintenance (79d2d02) (@ralphtheninja)

Added

  • Add nyc and coveralls (#36, #44) (@ralphtheninja, @vweevers)
  • Add CHANGELOG.md and UPGRADING.md (#47) (@vweevers)

Removed

  • Remove node 9 from travis (ffe3f92) (@ralphtheninja)
  • Remove experimental typings (1cfd23f) (@ralphtheninja)

Fixed

  • Fix subtests by adding t.plan() (#46) (@vweevers)

9.0.0 - 2018-05-12

Changed

  • Update README (#31) (@ralphtheninja)

Added

  • Add standard (#29) (@ralphtheninja)
  • Add node 9 and 10 (9476e58) (@ralphtheninja)

Removed

  • Drop node 0.12, 4, 5 and 7 (9476e58, #32) (@ralphtheninja)

Fixed

  • Fix constructor to work without new (#30) (@ralphtheninja)

8.0.0 - 2017-10-21

Changed

  • Revert “fix utf-8 encoding returning buffers” (#23) (@ralphtheninja)

Added

  • Add badges to README and stylize “levelup” (#22) (@vweevers)
  • Document encodings and their format in greater detail (#22) (@vweevers)

7.1.0 - 2017-09-12

Changed

  • Update copyright year from 2015 to 2017 (aceb6ff) (@ralphtheninja)

Added

  • Add basic typings (#18) (@MeirionHughes)
  • Add node 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 (5c00a1c) (@ralphtheninja)

Removed

  • Drop node 0.10 and iojs (5c00a1c) (@ralphtheninja)

7.0.1 - 2017-08-14

Added

  • Add Greenkeeper (#17) (@ralphtheninja)

Fixed

  • Use identity function consistently (#14) (@dcousens)

7.0.0 - 2017-01-26

Fixed

  • Fix utf-8 encoding returning buffers (#12) (@juliangruber)

6.2.0 - 2016-02-24

Changed

  • Rename “id” encoding to “none”, add “id” alias (#10) (@juliangruber)
  • Upgrade tape devDependency (#9) (@ralphtheninja)

Added

  • Document available encodings (#10) (@juliangruber)

6.1.0 - 2015-10-21

Added

  • Fallback to legacy encoding option if valueEncoding is not provided (#8) (@dominictarr)

6.0.0 - 2015-05-04

Changed

  • Replace createDecodeStream() with createStreamDecoder() (#6) (@juliangruber)

5.5.0 - 2015-04-17

Added

  • Add createDecodeStream() (#5) (@juliangruber)

5.4.0 - 2015-04-17

Changed

  • Simplify encodeLtgt() (24f3817) (@juliangruber)

5.3.0 - 2015-04-17

Added

  • Add encodeLtgt() (#4) (@juliangruber)

5.2.0 - 2015-03-24

Changed

  • Make all options optional (4f942eb) (@juliangruber)

5.1.0 - 2015-03-24

Changed

  • Make member options optional (0c98ccb) (@juliangruber)

5.0.0 - 2015-03-24

Historical Note 4.3.0 was meant to be a major release.

4.3.0 - 2015-03-24

Changed

  • Rewrite (37f103e, 054fb3f, f510a90) (@juliangruber)

Added

  • Add @ralphtheninja to contributors (dd2b9a0) (@juliangruber)
  • Add travis and licensing (#1) (@ralphtheninja)

4.2.0 - 2015-03-19

Fixed

  • Keep batch .prefix for level-sublevel (f706482) (@juliangruber)

4.1.0 - 2015-03-19

Fixed

  • Set batch encodings to binary if {key,value}AsBuffer is true (bcf6feb) (@juliangruber)

4.0.1 - 2015-03-19

Fixed

  • Skip falsy objects in walk (270ea17) (@juliangruber)

4.0.0 - 2015-03-19

Removed

  • Remove default encoding (28a63b2) (@juliangruber)

3.1.0 - 2015-03-19

Added

  • Add experimental Codec class (8a189f4) (@juliangruber)

3.0.0 - 2015-03-18

Removed

  • Remove encoding option in favor of keyEncoding and valueEncoding (9fed84d) (@juliangruber)

2.0.1 - 2015-03-18

Fixed

  • Fix encoding option to only be an alias for valueEncoding (b4de4d1) (@juliangruber)

2.0.0 - 2015-03-18

Changed

  • Remove side effects from batch() (bedaa26, 6f5b373, abef01b) (@juliangruber)

1.2.1 - 2015-03-18

Fixed

  • Fix require statements for {key,value}AsBuffer() (71bf7a5) (@juliangruber)

1.2.0 - 2015-03-18

Added

  • Add {key,value}AsBuffer() (796a540) (@juliangruber)

1.1.0 - 2015-03-18

Added

  • Add decode{Key,Value} (029fbd7) (@juliangruber)

1.0.1 - 2015-03-18

:seedling: Initial release.
